function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Influence of personal attributes and environmental contexts on the use of green areas","Impact":"Misunderstanding of factors influencing green area visitation may lead to ineffective disease mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Conducting detailed research to accurately identify factors influencing green area visitation and disease propagation.","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, statistical software, and geographic information systems.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
